description: Sets aside (overrides) all approval rule requirements for a specified pull request.

parameters.name: pullRequestId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID of the pull request for which you want to override all approval rule requirements. To get this information, use  GetPullRequest.

parameters.name: revisionId
parameters.description: The system-generated ID of the most recent revision of the pull request. You cannot override approval rules for anything but the most recent revision of a pull request. To get the revision ID, use GetPullRequest.

parameters.name: overrideStatus
parameters.description: Whether you want to set aside approval rule requirements for the pull request (OVERRIDE) or revoke a previous override and apply approval rule requirements (REVOKE). REVOKE status is not stored.
